mapper.select:
select t1.code processType, t1.name processTypeName, process_id processId, process_code processCode, process_name processName, process_remark processRemark, process_status processStatus, process_cron processCron, cron_calibration cronCalibration, every_day_start_flag everyDayStartFlag, execute_max executeMax, process_limittime processLimittime
from py_process t inner join py_process_type t1 on t.process_type=t1.code where t.disable = '1'

select t.item_code f_f_1_menuId, t.item_name f_f_1_menuName, y1.icon_addr f_f_1_icon, s1.is_expend f_f_1_expanded,
t1.type_code f_f_2_menuId, t1.name f_f_2_menuName, y2.icon_addr f_f_2_icon, s2.is_expend f_f_2_expanded,
t2.process_code f_f_3_menuId, t2.process_name f_f_3_menuName, y3.icon_addr f_f_3_icon, s3.is_expend f_f_3_expanded,
t2.process_id processId
from py_process_m0_item t left join py_process_m1_type t1 on t.item_code=t1.item_code and t1.`disable`=1 left join py_process_m2_process t2 on t2.type_code=t1.type_code and t2.`disable`=1
left join py_style_tooth s1 on s1.`type`='main_m0' and s1.item_code=t.item_code and s1.`disable`=1 left join py_style y1 on s1.style_code = y1.code and y1.diable=1
left join py_style_tooth s2 on s2.`type`='main_m1' and s2.item_code=t1.type_code and s2.`disable`=1 left join py_style y2 on s2.style_code = y2.code and y2.diable=1
left join py_style_tooth s3 on s3.`type`='main_m2' and s3.item_code=t2.process_code and s3.`disable`=1 left join py_style y3 on s3.style_code = y3.code and y3.diable=1
where t.`disable`= '1' order by t.`order`,t1.`order`,t2.`order`

select cast(t0.id as char) f_f_1_menuId, t0.name f_f_1_menuName,
cast(t1.id as char) f_f_2_menuId, t1.name f_f_2_menuName,
cast(t2.id as char) f_f_3_menuId, t2.name f_f_3_menuName,
cast(t3.id as char) f_f_4_menuId, t3.name f_f_4_menuName
from
menu0 t0 left join menu1 t1 on t0.id=t1.parent_id
left join menu2 t2 on t1.id=t2.parent_id
left join menu3 t3 on t2.id=t3.parent_id
